text: Stephen Welsh (born 19 January 2000) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Celtic, as a defender. ==Club career== Welsh began his career in the youth sides at Celtic, stepping up to their development side in 2017, and in March 2018, signed a contract with the club until 2020. Alongside fixtures in the SPFL Development League, he featured for the team in the Scottish Challenge Cup. On 29 August 2019, Welsh moved on a season-long loan to Scottish Championship club Greenock Morton. He was recalled by Celtic during January 2020. ==International career== Welsh has represented Scotland at under-17 and under-19 levels. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Scottish Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Celtic |2017–18 |Scottish Premiership |0||0||0||0||0||0||1Appearances for Celtic under-20s/21s in the Scottish Challenge Cup in which age-restricted sides from the Scottish Premiership clubs compete against senior clubs.||0||1||0 |- |2018–19 |Scottish Premiership |0||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |- |2019–20 |Scottish Premiership |1||0||0||0||0||0||2||0||3||0 |- |2020–21 |Scottish Premiership |1||0||0||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||1||0 |- !colspan=2|Total !2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!4!!0!!6!!0 |- |Greenock Morton (loan) |2019–20 |Scottish Championship |15||0||3||0||0||0||0||0||18||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !17!!0!!3!!0!!0!!0!!4!!0!!24!!0 |} ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Scotland youth international footballers Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Greenock Morton F.C. players Category:Scottish Professional Football League players
